member.name: T:TopOA.Core.ICommandHandler`1
member.summary: A command handler inherits from this interface. It can be exposed to consumers, or it can serve as a reminder to implement Execute(TCommand) then pull it up to a specific interface.

member.name: T:TopOA.Core.IQueryHandler`2
member.summary: A reader (query handler) inherits from this interface. It can be exposed to consumers, or it can serve as a reminder to implement Query(TQuery) then pull it up to a specific interface.

member.name: T:TopOA.Core.IValidator`1
member.summary: A reader or command handler inherits from this interface. It can be exposed to consumers, or it can serve as a reminder to implement Validate(T) then pull it up to a specific interface.

member.name: M:TopOA.Core.IValidator`1.Validate(`0)
member.summary: Returns UserSettingsLogEventId.NoError iff the command or query passes validation.
